title: A Life in the day of a cycle courier
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, production facilities
abstract: A quirky tale about girls on bikes
description: Sarah's a cycle courier chasing the money, but at what price? Short and succinct this quirky little tale bounces along to the tune of "I Quite Like Girls on Bikes" written and performed by Urban Tramper and His Pack. Features Paige Anderson as girl on bike.
